summary:
## CN Tower: A Toronto Icon

The CN Tower in Toronto, Canada, is a massive concrete tower standing at 553.3 meters tall. It was the world's tallest structure for 32 years! Built by a railway company, its name "CN" means Canadian National. Now owned by a government real estate company, it attracts over two million visitors yearly. It boasts observation decks, a revolving restaurant, and an entertainment complex, making it a must-see landmark in Toronto.
title: CN Tower
